Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The Albanese Government is considering cutting billions from infrastructure projects and increasing JobSeeker allowance for people over 55. Employers are bracing for new laws compelling them to pay superannuation on payday recouping billions lost from lost retirement income. The Prime Minister has also announced new health facilities to better service residents in rural and remote areas. Funding has been announced for a new National Emergency Alerting System project designed to provide instant and prioritized emergency messages in critical disaster situations.
